field.name: fPassByRange
field.desc: Distance from player at which pass by sound will play.

field.name: fMinPassByVelocity
field.desc: Min velocity (m/s) at which an explosive must be moving while active for the passby sound to trigger. Should be high enough not to trigger when it's rolling on the floor.

field.name: mixExplosionPreset
field.desc: Preset that will play if player is close enough to Explosion. WARNING, this preset must stop on it's own.

field.name: fExplosionPresetDistance
field.desc: Distance from player at which explosion preset sound will play.

field.name: fNearDistance
field.desc: Explosions That Are Closer than Near Distance will apply NearRumbleModifier to the CamShakeAndRumble, explosions that are between Near and Far Distance will be Linearly interpolated between Near and Far Modifier.

field.name: fNearRumbleMultiplier
field.desc: Explosions That Are Closer than Near Distance will apply NearRumbleModifier to the CamShakeAndRumble, explosions that are between Near and Far Distance will be Linearly interpolated between Near and Far Modifier.

field.name: fFarDistance
field.desc: Explosions That Are Farther than Far Distance will apply No Modifier to the CamShakeAndRumble, explosions that are between Near and Far Distance will be Linearly interpolated between Near and Far Modifier.

field.name: fFarRumbleMultiplier
field.desc: Explosions That Are Farther than Far Distance will apply No Modifier to the CamShakeAndRumble, explosions that are between Near and Far Distance will be Linearly interpolated between Near and Far Modifier.

field.name: bUseOriginForUnderwaterCheck
field.desc: If false it will test for being underwater based on the bounding box, which may be much larger.

field.name: bSpawnTrailSeparately
field.desc: Spawn trail only when the explosive is properly activated. E.g. when thrown.

field.name: psIdle
field.desc: Particle activated at the start if spawn trail separately is ticked.

field.name: sIdleParticleBone
field.desc: Bone to attach the idle particles to.

field.name: sStickyFireWeaponName
field.desc: Weapon name used by sticky fire stim
